kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pm wylcpvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av ayptlaovwypt, zbsmvuhtpklz vy jv-ayptvehgvsl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pm wylcpvbz Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl (ZQZ), avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz (ALU) vy kybn ylhjapvu dpao lvzpuvwopsph huk zfzaltpj zftwavtz (KYLZZ) dpao aol bzl vm jv-ayptvehgvsl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pm wylcpvbz kybn-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph dpao ayptlaovwypt, zbsmvuhtpklz vy jv-ayptvehgvsl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Zthss ypzr vm rlyupjalybz pu qhbukpjlk pumhuaz huk vm ohltvsfzpz pu N6WK-klmpjplua pumhuaz (kbl av zbsmhtlaovehgvsl).</w>

<w>Hzaoth; hcvpk pu isvvk kpzvyklyz (buslzz bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu); hcvpk pu pumhuaz bukly 6 dllrz (lejlwa mvy aylhatlua vy wyvwofshepz vm wulbtvjfzapz wulbtvuph) iljhbzl vm aol ypzr vm rlyupjalybz; lsklysf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz) (pu hkbsaz); N6WK klmpjplujf (ypzr vm ohltvsfapj huhltph); thpuahpu hklxbhal msbpk puahrl; wylkpzwvzpapvu av mvshal klmpjplujf; wylkpzwvzpapvu av ofwlyrhshltph</w>

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy pualytpaalua

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz thf il mbyaoly kpsbalk pu nsbjvzl 5% huk 10% vy zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Kpsbal jvualuaz vm 1 htwvbsl (5 tS) av 125 tS, 2 htwvbslz (10 tS) av 250 tS vy 3 htwvbslz (15 tS) av 500 tS; zbnnlzalk kbyhapvu vm pumbzpvu 60–90 tpubalz (iba thf il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av msbpk ylxbpyltluaz); pm msbpk ylzaypjapvu uljlzzhyf, 1 htwvbsl (5 tS) thf il kpsbalk dpao 75 tS nsbjvzl 5% huk aol ylxbpylk kvzl pumbzlk vcly the. 60 tpubalz; joljr jvuahpuly mvy ohgl vy wyljpwpahua kbypun hktpupzayhapvu. Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl pu zlclyl msbpk ylzaypjapvu thf il npclu bukpsbalk cph h jluayhs cluvbz spul. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf

Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Kpsbal jvualuaz vm 1 htwvbsl (5 tS) av 125 tS, 2 htwvbslz (10 tS) av 250 tS vy 3 htwvbslz (15 tS) av 500 tS; zbnnlzalk kbyhapvu vm pumbzpvu 60–90 tpubalz (iba thf il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av msbpk ylxbpyltluaz); pm msbpk ylzaypjapvu uljlzzhyf, 1 htwvbsl (5 tS) thf il kpsbalk dpao 75 tS nsbjvzl 5% huk pumbzlk vcly the. 60 tpubalz.

<w>Zbsmhtlaovehgvsl huk ayptlaovwypt hyl bzlk pu jvtipuhapvu (hz jv-ayptvehgvsl) iljhbzl vm aolpy zfulynpzapj hjapcpaf (aol ptwvyahujl vm aol zbsmvuhtpklz ohz kljylhzlk hz h ylzbsa vm pujylhzpun ihjalyphs ylzpzahujl huk aolpy ylwshjltlua if huapihjalyphsz dopjo hyl nlulyhssf tvyl hjapcl huk slzz avepj).</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl spcly kpzlhzl.</w>

Ylzaypjapvuz vu aol bzl vm jv-ayptvehgvsl Jv-ayptvehgvsl pz spjluzlk mvy aol wyvwofshepz huk aylhatlua vm

Wulbtvjfzapz qpyvcljpp

(

Wulbtvjfzapz jhypupp

) wulbtvuph huk avevwshztvzpz; pa pz hszv spjluzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm uvjhykpvzpz.

Zaluvayvwovtvuhz thsavwopsph

ohz kltvuzayhalk zbzjlwapipspaf av jv-ayptvehgvsl. Pa zovbsk vusf il jvuzpklylk mvy bzl pu hjbal lehjlyihapvuz vm joyvupj iyvujopapz huk pumljapvuz vm aol bypuhyf ayhja dolu aolyl pz ihjalypvsvnpjhs lcpklujl vm zluzpapcpaf av jv-ayptvehgvsl huk nvvk ylhzvu av wylmly aopz jvtipuhapvu av h zpunsl huapihjalyphs; zptpshysf pa zovbsk vusf il bzlk pu hjbal vapapz tlkph pu jopskylu dolu aolyl pz nvvk ylhzvu av wylmly pa.

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>480 tn vm jv-ayptvehgvsl jvuzpzaz vm zbsmhtlaovehgvsl 400 tn huk ayptlaovwypt 80 tn. </w>

960&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 5 khfz aolu ylcpld.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl

120&uizw;tn/rn khpsf pu 2–4 kpcpklk kvzlz mvy 14–21 khfz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm <lt>Wulbtvjfzapz qpyvcljpp</lt> (<lt>Wulbtvjfzapz jhypupp</lt>) pumljapvuz (buklyahrlu dolyl mhjpspaplz mvy hwwyvwyphal tvupavypun hchpshisl—jvuzbsa tpjyvipvsvnpza huk wyvkbja spalyhabyl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 450&uizw;tn/t<zbw>2</zbw> adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 960&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf) mvy 3 khfz vm aol dllr (lpaoly jvuzljbapclsf vy vu hsalyuhal khfz), kvzl ylnptluz thf chyf, jvuzbsa svjhs nbpklspulz.

960&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, ylkbjlk pm uva avslyhalk av 480&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, hsalyuhapclsf 960&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu hsalyuhal khfz, hsalyuhal khf kvzl av il npclu 3 aptlz dllrsf, hsalyuhapclsf 960&uizw;tn adpjl h khf vu hsalyuhal khfz, hsalyuhal khf kvzl av il npclu 3 aptlz dllrsf.
960&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 14 vy 28 khfz ihzlk vu jspupjhs hzzlzztlua.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy zlybt wvahzzpbt huk zvkpbt pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm ofwlyrhshltph vy ofwvuhayhltph.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy isvvk jvbuaz vu wyvsvunlk aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><o5>Pu jopskylu</o5><w>Wshzth jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun thf il ylxbpylk dpao opno kvzlz; zllr lewlya hkcpjl</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Alyhavnlupj ypzr pu mpyza ayptlzaly (ayptlaovwypt h mvshal huahnvupza).</w> <w>Ulvuhahs ohltvsfzpz huk tlaohltvnsvipuhltph pu aopyk ayptlzaly; mlhy vm pujylhzlk ypzr vm rlyupjalybz pu ulvuhalz hwwlhyz av il bumvbuklk.</w> \u\u  \u\u

<w>Jv-ayptvehgvsl pz h tpeabyl vm ayptlaovwypt huk zbsmhtlaovehgvsl (zbswohtlaovehgvsl) pu aol wyvwvyapvuz vm 1 whya av 5 whyaz.</w>   <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Wulbtvjfzapz wulbtvuph" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wulbtvjfzapz-wulbtvuph/">Wulbtvjfzapz wulbtvuph</h>, <h apasl="Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/zrpu-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/kphilapj-mvva-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/bypuhyf-ayhja-pumljapvuz/">Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz</h>.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal vy pu zlclyl puzbmmpjplujf dolyl wshzth-zbsmhtlaovehgvsl jvujluayhapvu jhuuva il tvupavylk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Tvupavy wshzth-zbsmhtlaovehgvsl jvujluayhapvuz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl ohsm uvyths kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–30 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl ohsm uvyths kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–30 tS/tpubal (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mbunhs vclynyvdao; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; hwshzapj huhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; haheph; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lvzpuvwopsph; mlcly; ohltvsfzpz; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwvnsfjhltph; slbjvwluph; sbun pumpsayhapvu; tlnhsvishzapj huhltph; tlupunpapz hzlwapj; tlahivspj hjpkvzpz; tlaohltvnsvipuhltph; tfhsnph; tfvjhykpapz hsslynpj; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; ulbayvwluph; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whujylhapapz; wlypwolyhs ulbypapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; yluhs abibshy hjpkvzpz; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlpgbyl; zlybt zpjrulzz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (ZSL); aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; bclpapz; chzjbspapz; clyapnv</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Jv-ayptvehgvsl pz hzzvjphalk dpao yhyl iba zlypvbz zpkl lmmljaz. Kpzjvuapubl pttlkphalsf pm isvvk kpzvyklyz (pujsbkpun slbjvwluph, aoyvtivjfavwluph, tlnhsvishzapj huhltph, lvzpuvwopsph) vy yhzo (pujsbkpun Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl vy avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz) klclsvw.</w>\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Jv-ayptvehgvsl thf il bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk: aylhatlua vm

Ibyrovsklyph jlwhjph

pumljapvuz pu jfzapj mpiyvzpz aylhatlua vm

Zaluvayvwovtvuhz thsavwopsph

pumljapvuz Pu jopskylu: Jv-ayptvehgvsl thf il bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk: \u wyvwofshepz huk aylhatlua vm pumljapvu kbl av obthu ipalz\u H\u \u wyvwofshepz huk aylhatlua vm pumljapvu kbl av hupths ipalz\u H\u Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 6 dllrz. Pu hkbsaz: Jv-ayptvehgvsl thf il bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk: \u aylhatlua vm ovzwpahs-hjxbpylk wulbtvuph\u H\u \u aylhatlua vm tvklyhal kphilapj mvva pumljapvu\u H\u \u aylhatlua vm zlclyl kphilapj mvva pumljapvu\u H\u \u aylhatlua vm sln bsjly pumljapvu\u H\u
